title: Bright rooms! 3 bedroom 2 bath apt, Modern kitchen, Swimming pool
posting_body: Nestled amid a beautiful tree-lined street in the vibrant Mountain View area, the newly renovated Palmetto Apartments offers you a home that is well beyond extraordinary.
Each one, two, three, and four bedroom home provides spacious floor plans, modern kitchens, hardwood-style flooring, dual pane windows and private patios and balconies.
This charming community also features a refreshing swimming pool, convenient laundry care center, abundant storage and plentiful parking.
Palmetto Apartments is located near the pedestrian-friendly downtown area, home to numerous fine dining, shopping and entertainment venues.
The area also provides top rated schools, easy access to major Highways, and major employers such as Google.
BBQ Picnic area for your convenience
Enjoy 2 assigned parking spots in a gated carport area plus additional storage space at no extra charge
Contact us today to schedule a tour!
Photos in ad may not be of actual apartment, however we try our best to use photos similar to the floor plan.

related search terms ::: mountain view, downtown mountain view, US-101, 101 freeway, I-85 freeway, highway 280, 237 freeway, 82 freeway, google campus, central expressway, el camino real, los altos, palo alto, sunnyvale
